last_ping_tag.description: Tag for the received last_ping. One of the algorithms that might be used to generate this is UUID4. If a ping is retried, the same tag should be used. Example: 'be62e49f-d94e-411b-a060-1abc82d21b64'

addon_name.description: Identifier of the SDK integration. Example: 'eyeo-chromium-sdk' or 'eyeo-webext'

addon_version.description: Respective version corresponding to addon_name. Example: '2.0.0'

application.description: Identifier of either hosting (partner's) application or product as sent by the client. Example: 'chrome'

application_version.description: Respective version corresponding to application. Example: '86.0.4240.183'

first_ping.description: Date of the first telemetry ping sent by the client and acknowledged by the server (as measured by the server), in timestamp format. Example: 2020-12-05T00:00:00.000000Z

last_ping.description: Date of the last telemetry ping sent by the client and acknowledged by the server (as measured by the server), in timestamp format. Example: 2021-01-31T00:00:00.000000Z

previous_last_ping.description: Date of the previous to last telemetry ping sent by the client and acknowledged by the server (as measured by the server), in timestamp format. Example: 2021-01-29T00:00:00.000000Z

aa_active.description: TRUE if client opted into Acceptable Ads

platform_version.description: Respective version corresponding to OS. Example: '10'

extension_name.description: Identifier of the browser extension, if applicable. Example: 'adblock-plus' or 'adblock'

extension_version.description: Browser extension version, if applicable. Example: '4.24.0'
